cwitools.params module¶

CWITools library for handling of parameter (.param) files.

This module contains functions for loading, creating and saving CWITools parameter files, which are needed to make use of the CWITools.reduction module.

cwitools.params.findfiles(params, cubeType)¶

Finds the input files given a CWITools parameter file and cube type.

Parameters

  • params (dict) – CWITools parameters dictionary.

  • cubeType (str) – Type of cube (e.g. icubes.fits) to load.

Returns

List of file paths of input cubes.

Return type

string list

cwitools.params.loadparams(paramPath)¶

Load a CWITools parameter file into a dictionary structure.

Parameters

paramPath (str) – Path to CWITools parameter file.

Returns

Python dictionary containing CWITools parameters

Return type

dict

CWITools
